dcterms:creator: Y. Choukroun
L. Wolf
dcterms:description: The (63,45) BCH code is used as a benchmark for evaluating the performance of the proposed GNN-based decoder, showcasing competitive decoding performance compared to traditional belief propagation decoding.
dcterms:title: (63,45) BCH code

dcterms:description: The 5G NR LDPC code is utilized to evaluate the GNN decoder's performance, demonstrating its ability to adapt to varying code parameters and achieve competitive results against traditional decoding methods.
dcterms:title: 5G NR LDPC code

dcterms:description: Regular (3,6) LDPC codes are employed to assess the scalability of the GNN decoder, highlighting its performance in comparison to traditional belief propagation decoding.
dcterms:title: Regular (3,6) LDPC codes
